video.title: Sliders
video.synopsis: In this sci-fi series, a physics graduate student creates a device that thrusts him and his friends into an endless parade of parallel universes.

episodes.synopsis: A teleportation device allows a young genius and his friends to "slide" between parallel worlds, familiar places with sometimes-deadly differences.
episodes.title: Pilot: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: A teleportation device allows a young genius and his friends to "slide" between parallel worlds, familiar places with sometimes-deadly differences.
episodes.title: Pilot: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Quinn and the sliders land in a world devastated by an infectious disease spread by Quinn's double. Rembrandt and Arturo rush to save their friends.
episodes.title: Fever

episodes.synopsis: There's no time for tea and crumpets when the sliders arrive in an America in which the British won the Revolutionary War.
episodes.title: The Prince of Wails

episodes.synopsis: The sliders land in a present-day San Francisco celebrating the Summer of Love, but a timer glitch separates Arturo and Quinn from Wade and Rembrandt.
episodes.title: Summer of Love

episodes.synopsis: Quinn and Arturo become celebrities when the gang lands in a world where the nerds rule the jocks. Quinn's counterpart is a troubled college athlete.
episodes.title: Eggheads

episodes.synopsis: Fleeting fame finds Rembrandt again when the sliders are transported to a world in which the singer's double is a rock 'n' roll icon.
episodes.title: The King Is Back

episodes.synopsis: Believing they've landed in a peaceful utopia, the sliders decide to take advantage of their surroundings and recuperate from their wild adventures.
episodes.title: Luck of the Draw

episodes.synopsis: When the sliders arrive in an occult-obsessed world, Quinn unwittingly cuts a deal with a mystic and can only be saved by a powerful sorcerer.
episodes.title: Into the Mystic

episodes.synopsis: The wormhole transports the sliders to a world in which biological warfare has decimated the male population, and the sliders are being hunted.
episodes.title: Love Gods

episodes.synopsis: A lightning bolt strikes during a slide, trapping Quinn on the astral plane while the others land in a technology-phobic world.
episodes.title: Gillian of the Spirits

episodes.synopsis: The sliders arrive in a modern-day gun-loving world ruled by Texas, where Quinn, Hailed as a quick draw, gets caught up in a gunfight.
episodes.title: The Good, the Bad and the Wealthy

episodes.synopsis: When the sliders find a dystopia ruled by violence, Quinn decides to rescue a girl from her murderous boyfriend leaving the cruel world behind.
episodes.title: El Sid

episodes.synopsis: Minutes before the sliders jump into the vortex, Wade witnesses a brutal murder. The team lands in a new destination -- or is it?
episodes.title: Time Again and World

episodes.synopsis: The sliders meet Jurassic Park in this adventure, landing in a world where San Francisco is a wildlife preserve for dinosaurs.
episodes.title: In Dino Veritas

episodes.synopsis: The travelers return home, where Arturo, Rembrandt and Wade use their sliding adventures to their advantage, and Arturo wants to win the Nobel Prize.
episodes.title: Post-Traumatic Slide Syndrome

episodes.synopsis: Quinn and the sliders arrive on a world controlled by psychics, where Wade meets a man she believes is her eternal soul mate.
episodes.title: Obsession

episodes.synopsis: In a world where Prohibition was never repealed and crime rules, the sliders get mixed up in a battle between gangsters, politicians and the feds.
episodes.title: Greatfellas

episodes.synopsis: On a world where youth rules and the middle-aged are put out to pasture, Quinn and Wade's doubles are ruthless software executives.
episodes.title: The Young and the Relentless

episodes.synopsis: The sliders are transported to a world under an alien invasion. Unaware that the aliens are sliders out to gain control of every parallel universe.
episodes.title: Invasion

episodes.synopsis: It's déjà vu for the sliders when they encounter the same people in three different worlds, and Quinn keeps meeting his former flame Daelin.
episodes.title: As Time Goes By

episodes.synopsis: Arriving in the middle of a treacherous survival game in progress, the sliders learn there's only one rule: Whoever stays alive wins.
episodes.title: Rules of the Game

episodes.synopsis: When the sliders arrive in a world where natural resources are in short supply, they meet scientists trying to develop their own sliding apparatus.
episodes.title: Double Cross

episodes.synopsis: The sliders arrive in a desert environment destroyed by unusual electrical activity and dangerous tornadoes and run into some unfriendly citizens.
episodes.title: Electric Twister Acid Test

episodes.synopsis: When the sliders arrive in a world that moves at a slower pace than our own, Quinn comes face to face with a younger version of himself.
episodes.title: The Guardian

episodes.synopsis: The sliders land in a world where a rebel group controls people by invading and editing their dreams, first concentrating on Wade.
episodes.title: The Dream Masters

episodes.synopsis: Landing in a desert world, the sliders are drawn into a power struggle over a woman valued for her ability to find underground reservoirs of water.
episodes.title: Desert Storm

episodes.synopsis: The sliders arrive in a world controlled by potent magical beings, and Quinn is mistakenly fingered as a wizard who must be destroyed.
episodes.title: Dragonslide

episodes.synopsis: After the sliders flee a world completely taken over by fire, they arrive in a dimension where the world's oil is centered in Los Angeles.
episodes.title: The Fire Within

episodes.synopsis: The sliders arrive in a dimension where men have babies, America is a monarchy and Rembrandt is mistaken for his double.
episodes.title: The Prince of Slides

episodes.synopsis: When Quinn is mistaken for his double -- an alleged murderer -- and sentenced to death on a TV show, the other sliders hunt for the real suspect.
episodes.title: Dead Man Sliding

episodes.synopsis: When the sliders arrive in a world where androids have replaced human beings, a scientist captures Quinn and Rembrandt, intent on making them robots.
episodes.title: State of the Art

episodes.synopsis: It's the holiday season, and the sliders land in a consumer-driven world where most people live and work in giant malls.
episodes.title: Season's Greedings

episodes.synopsis: After Arturo is kidnapped, his captors brainwash him until he believes he's a detective on the hunt for Jack the Ripper.
episodes.title: Murder Most Foul

episodes.synopsis: When the sliders arrive in a world that bears a striking resemblance to ancient Egypt, Quinn is taken prisoner and used as an experimental guinea pig.
episodes.title: Slide Like an Egyptian

episodes.synopsis: Arriving in a bucolic town, the sliders don't understand why the nervous young residents seem so suspicious of outsiders.
episodes.title: Paradise Lost

episodes.synopsis: The sliders arrive on an ill-fated version of Earth facing imminent destruction from the radiation of a collapsed pulsar.
episodes.title: The Exodus: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Quinn continues searching for an alternate world to save the residents of the doomed version of Earth, but Col. Rickman has his own agenda.
episodes.title: The Exodus: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When the sliders land in a world taken over by brutal bacteria, Quinn becomes infected. The rest of the group scrambles to find a cure.
episodes.title: Sole Survivors

episodes.synopsis: After the sliders flee a world crammed with parasites, they discover Maggie has become host to an alien creature that intends to reproduce.
episodes.title: The Breeder

episodes.synopsis: After arriving in a world devastated by earthquakes, the sliders have adventures in an underground city where they encounter primitive natives.
episodes.title: The Last of Eden

episodes.synopsis: When the sliders land on a world plagued by superstition, they once again run into the evil Col. Angus Rickman and fear he may be spreading infection.
episodes.title: The Other Slide of Darkness

episodes.synopsis: While returning from a vacation in Mexico, Quinn and Rembrandt get stuck in a jungle, caught up in an illegal snake-trafficking outfit.
episodes.title: Slither

episodes.synopsis: When the sliders return to the world to which they helped Col. Rickman transport 150 survivors, they discover it's been overtaken by dinosaurs.
episodes.title: Dinoslide

episodes.synopsis: When Wade becomes obsessed with a goth-rock band, she doesn't realize they're vampires. Meanwhile, the rest of the sliders track down Col. Rickman.
episodes.title: Stoker

episodes.synopsis: Still hunting Col. Rickman, the sliders land on an island where a scientist tampering with genetic cross-breeding has created a race of hybrids.
episodes.title: This Slide of Paradise

episodes.synopsis: Their three-month search for Rembrandt and Wade finally brings Quinn and Maggie to Earth Prime, a planet dominated by the Kromaggs.
episodes.title: Genesis

episodes.synopsis: Maggie, Rembrandt and Quinn land in an alternate United States controlled by a fundamentalist government called the Oracle.
episodes.title: Prophets and Loss

episodes.synopsis: Maggie saves the life of an enemy at a Kromagg munitions facility, but her heroism won't stop the creation of a weapon designed to wipe out humanity.
episodes.title: Common Ground

episodes.synopsis: Injured in an explosion, the sliders recuperate in a hospital on a world where virtual reality is used to subdue and heal.
episodes.title: Virtual Slide

episodes.synopsis: In a desolate postapocalyptic San Francisco, the team encounters only one citizen: Quinn's half-mad double, who believes he caused the disaster.
episodes.title: World Killer

episodes.synopsis: The sliders land on a pastoral Earth, where they find Quinn's long-lost brother, Colin. They persuade him to join them in their quest to return home.
episodes.title: Oh Brother, Where Art Thou?

episodes.synopsis: In a world where the Drug Empowerment Administration mandates drug use to keep its citizens happy, Rembrandt and Quinn must save Maggie and Colin.
episodes.title: Just Say Yes

episodes.synopsis: The sliders take refuge from an acid rain storm in the Chandler Hotel, where Colin sees a ghost and the timer inexplicably vanishes.
episodes.title: The Alternateville Horror

episodes.synopsis: Colin and Quinn's hopes are dashed when what they expect to be their final slide lands them on a world where humans and Kromaggs battle to survive.
episodes.title: Slidecage

episodes.synopsis: Quinn is injured as the sliders land in a world overrun by Kromaggs. Rembrandt falls for Quinn's doctor, who has a history of siding with the enemy.
episodes.title: Asylum

episodes.synopsis: In an alternate California that's become a racist state, the sliders fight to rescue Rembrandt, who's been captured and sent to a slave encampment.
episodes.title: California Reich

episodes.synopsis: Colin is seized when the sliders land on a bizarre world where Hu-Maggs -- half-human, half-Kromagg warriors -- hunt humans for sport.
episodes.title: The Dying Fields

episodes.synopsis: With only two hours before the next window closes, the sliders become separated on a world enraptured by a tabloid television show, "Lipschitz Live!"
episodes.title: Lipschitz Live!

episodes.synopsis: The sliders rescue a woman and her half-Kromagg baby from a Kromagg breeder camp, is it's plagued by a virus that threatens the infant's life.
episodes.title: Mother and Child

episodes.synopsis: After being separated, Colin and Maggie, trapped on the streets with scavengers, fight their way to a high-tech facility housing Rembrandt and Quinn.
episodes.title: Net Worth

episodes.synopsis: Maggie is stranded in a militaristic America. Meanwhile, Quinn, Colin and Rembrandt struggle to escape from a world where all technology is forbidden.
episodes.title: Slide by Wire

episodes.synopsis: A return to the Chandler Hotel finally brings the sliders face to face with its enigmatic owner, Archibald Chandler, who asks that they never leave.
episodes.title: Data World

episodes.synopsis: In a Wild West world, a familiar outlaw named Mr. K shoots Colin. While a widow nurses him back to health, Mr. K waits to pounce on her land.
episodes.title: Way Out West

episodes.synopsis: On a world where clones provide the wealthy with body parts, Quinn becomes involved in a case of mistaken identity when he tries to rescue his double.
episodes.title: My Brother's Keeper

episodes.synopsis: In the happiest community in the world, a girl's grief for her grandfather, who leaped into a dark abyss, threatens to consume Maggie and Rembrandt.
episodes.title: The Chasm

episodes.synopsis: Rembrandt and Colin slide, followed by Maggie and Quinn. Apparently, something mysterious happened, as Maggie and Quinn become ill and age rapidly.
episodes.title: Roads Taken

episodes.synopsis: With the next slide a month away, the team is bored. That is, until Rembrandt discovers a science-fiction novel that seems to tell the sliders' story.
episodes.title: Revelations

episodes.synopsis: Rembrandt and Maggie can't find Colin after their latest slide, and in their search they encounter a man who claims to be Quinn.
episodes.title: The Unstuck Man

episodes.synopsis: Diana encounters her double for the first time while trying to rescue Quinn. The clock ticks as she works to separate Quinn from Mallory.
episodes.title: Applied Physics

episodes.synopsis: The timer malfunctions, leaving the Sliders stranded in a war-torn world where they're pressed into service by a rebellion against the Kromaggs.
episodes.title: Strangers and Comrades

episodes.synopsis: The sliders end up on a remote island. An order of monks give the sliders food and medical care but make a chilling demand in return.
episodes.title: The Great Work

episodes.synopsis: Before sliding, Mallory is shot and paralyzed. Faith healers in the new world can help him, but is the cure is worth the price they'll have to pay.
episodes.title: New Gods for Old

episodes.synopsis: While trying to buy candy from a vending machine, Maggie is seized by agents of a corporate-run government. The Sliders must try to get her back.
episodes.title: Please Press One

episodes.synopsis: When the Sliders arrive in a world where tabloid journalism is the main source of news, Maggie is implicated in an affair with the president.
episodes.title: A Current Affair

episodes.synopsis: In an America where Prohibition has banned caffeine rather than alcohol, the Sliders try to unravel the gangland shooting of a coffee bootlegger.
episodes.title: The Java Jive

episodes.synopsis: Maggie is hailed as a hero in an alternate America where her double is a famous astronaut. But she's soon kidnapped by the government.
episodes.title: The Return of Maggie Beckett

episodes.synopsis: The Sliders arrive in a world where the government banned combustion engines because of pollution, and Maggie falls for the leader of a biker gang.
episodes.title: Easy Slider

episodes.synopsis: Wade visits Rembrandt in a dream, but the Sliders dismiss the occurrence until they discover what appears to be Wade, held captive by the Kromaggs.
episodes.title: Requiem

episodes.synopsis: When the team is separated during a riot at a mental institution, Mallory poses as a doctor to rescue Diana, who's been mistaken for a patient.
episodes.title: Map of the Mind

episodes.synopsis: Sliding into a world where the favorite sport is arcade-like games, Rembrandt and Mallory suit up, unaware that Maggie and Diana are their targets.
episodes.title: A Thousand Deaths

episodes.synopsis: After sliding into the middle of the Pacific, the team is rescued by a ship. but their next slide is so close, they must shack up with a pirate crew.
episodes.title: Heavy Metal

episodes.synopsis: The damaged timer continues to make sliding unpredictable and dangerous, and the the only way to repair it may involve stealing a priceless gem.
episodes.title: To Catch a Slider

episodes.synopsis: The Sliders encounter an archaeological dig in a new world has no Los Angeles. The excavation's participants consider Rembrandt a deity.
episodes.title: Dust

episodes.synopsis: The team travels to a world torn apart by elemental upheaval. The Sliders encounter the real architect of the destruction: Dr. Geiger.
episodes.title: Eye of the Storm

episodes.synopsis: In their new world, the Sliders are hailed as messiahs. Its psychic founder reveals that he knows the devastating consequences of their next slide.
episodes.title: The Seer
